ygData.subject: Re: Making coin at level 10
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Kimes, Dean W.  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Thursday, June 03, 1999 2:06 PM Subject: [eqbards]
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 03, 1999 2:06 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Making coin at level 10


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Hello fellow loremasters!
>
>Due to my recent adventures with the rogue Evil Eye and resulting loss of
my
>only decent weapon I find a desperate need to acquire wealth. Could anyone
>offer any suggestions for a 10th level, sigh was 11th once, bard to really
>earn some coin? I have found it difficult to make much as most of the
>critters I get xp from are terribly cash poor in terms of loot available.
I
>have a monk friend so can take on stuff slightly more powerful than I
alone.
>All suggestions welcomed!
>
>wait...almost all...if someone shouts kill snakes I think I'll scream...
>
> Kitasi
> The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
> "and no one shall work for money,
> and no one shall work for fame"
> "but each for the joy of the working,
> and each to his seperate star..."
>
>
>oops, looks like I'll be working for money, kust more proof the world's not
>perfect };-)
>



Kill Snakes!!! <bg>

Truly, I killed darkweeds in E. commonlands from end of 9 through 14,
they're as common as, well, weeds. I think spawn points spawn a
variety of creatures, and one in the northwest corner of E.C. produces
DW snakes along with others. Since barely anyone hunts the
snakes, they become the predominant mob in that area.
They are all over the northwest corner. I used the mountain
behind the inn as a place to fight them.

The only problem is that if you solo them, the poison really boosts
your downtime, with a cleric buddy though.....

With luck you'll get a Giant snake fang (4g6s to an npc) or venom
sack (4g6s). Every once in a while I've gotten 1 of each or 2 of one
on the same snake, as good a haul as a lightstone, without the need
for a magic weapon.

I'm level 14, and I've just "moved" to the west coast. In the last 3 levels
I've put away 93pp in the bank. Now I have to decide on exactly how to
spend it (how much on banded, whether or not to buy a magic weap yet,
and if so what)

Tindayen, Journeyman Bard of Povar
